news.title: CES 2026: Everything revealed, from Nvidia’s debuts to AMD’s new chips to Razer’s AI oddities

news.title: Governments grapple with the flood of non-consensual nudity on X

news.title: Critics pan spyware maker NSO’s transparency claims amid its push to enter US market
news.summary: The infamous spyware maker released a new transparency report claiming to be a responsible spyware maker, without providing insight into how the company dealt with problematic customers in the past.

news.title: Xbox’s Towerborne is switching from a free-to-play game to a paid one

news.title: Show HN: Executable Markdown files with Unix pipes
news.summary:
I wanted to run markdown files like shell scripts. So I built an open source tool that lets you use a shebang to pipe them through Claude Code with full stdin/stdout support.task.md:    #!/usr/bin/env claude-run

    Analyze this codebase and summarize the architecture.

Then:    chmod +x task.md
